champ_0090_rival_02:
Caught you just as you finished up in here, huh?
Nice work![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0090_rival_03:
That puts you four badges in now, right? Man,
that’s awesome![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0090_rival_04:
I can’t believe you’re halfway through your Gym
journey already! Your efforts are bearing so much\r
fruit so quickly![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0090_rival_05:
It makes me wanna just challenge you to a battle
right here, right now!\c
But...I’m gonna have to wait.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0090_rival_06:
’Cause I put together my team of Pokémon
specifically to take on the Gym Leader... Dang it![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0090_rival_07:
When I battle you, I wanna do it under the best
possible conditions! Which means this time, I’ve\r
gotta ask for a rain check.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0090_rival_08:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Guhhh, this is the worst timing ever!
Sorry, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
